item.title: How do you make npcs talk?
item.dc:creator: @Lilium Lilium
item.description:
@Lilium wrote:

if you want your NPC to talk… open your ‘NPCHandler.java’ and search for this line: if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 ||
you should see something similiar to this: if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }
under the last ‘}’ add this line:

if (npcs[i].npcType == <NPC ID HERE>) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "<MESSAGE HERE>"; } }

: the message you want the NPC to show silly
: the NPC’s ID…
